Package io.github.ajevans.dbcode.dbexamples

Class UIfx

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
io.github.ajevans.dbcode.dbexamples.UIfx
public class UIfx
extends javafx.application.Application
GUI and workhorse for application.

Interface can be internationalised by changing the locale to a 2-character country language code in the /META-INF/application.properties file and supplying an appropriate equivalent to /META-INF/en.properties.

Defaults and test data can also be set in /META-INF/application.properties.

DataSuppliers and DataConsumers are added to the open and options menus of the GUI at runtime. To add one:

  • Implement IDataSupplier/IDataConsumer with a zero-parameter constructor only.
  • Place the class file in the classpath for this application.
  • Add the IDataSupplier/Consumer to the /META-INF/en-datasuppliers.properties or /META-INF/en-dataconsumers.properties file (where "en" can be replaced by the relevant country language code) in the format:
    full.class.name.DataSupplier=Open Menu Text
    for example:
    io.github.ajevans.dbcode.dataparsers.CruTs2pt1Parser=CRU TS 2.1...
Author:
Andy Evans
Version: 1.0 28 Feb 2021

  • Field Details

    • debug

      private boolean debug
      Debugging flag, set by System variable passed in at command line:

      jar -jar -Ddebug="true" jarLocation.jar

      rather than setting here / with accessor. Default "false".

    • propertiesFileLocation

      private java.lang.String propertiesFileLocation
      File location for properties files in jar / install directories. Note that "/" should work in Java on all platforms and from jars.

    • stage

      private javafx.stage.Stage stage
      Main GUI Stage.

    • outputDirectory

      private java.io.File outputDirectory
      Directory to write local results to.

    • buildGUI

      private void buildGUI​(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      Builds and displays the GUI.

      Not for calling; called by start. Utilises localized and loaded-class text for GUI from getLocalisedGUIText and getDataSuppliers, both of which need calling first.

      Parameters:
      stage - Javafx stage passed in via start.

    • saveLog

    • openFile

      private void openFile​(IDataSupplier dataSupplier)
      Opens file-open dialog to choose input.

      Users can open multiple files. Passes files, if chosen, to the appropriate IDataSupplier via run. Private, but called from MenuItems via a inner MenuHandler class objects.

      Parameters:
      dataSupplier - Data supplier.
      See Also:
      buildGUI(Stage stage)
      To Do:
      Although we catch unreadable files down the line, it would be nice to filter out known unusable file extensions here. Unfortunately none of the default filechooser systems allow this, though for a production version it might be worth implementing this StackOverflow solution by vian., Code within this method is a candidate for refactoring - see src code.

    • setCurrentConsumer

      private void setCurrentConsumer​(IDataConsumer consumer)
      Mutator for currently chosen consumer on "output" menu.

      Called by menu handler of output menu.

      Parameters:
      consumer - Consumer to set.

    • getLocalisedGUIText

      private void getLocalisedGUIText()
      Localization for GUI elements.

      Takes language option from project/jar /META-INF/application.properties and then language-specific terms from e.g. en.properties

      Defaults to English; defaults set in private instance variables.

      To Do:
      Pick language on first use and download appropriate properties file.

    • gapFillLocalisedGUIText

      private void gapFillLocalisedGUIText()
      Sets the defaults for GUI, warnings, and exceptions in English if an appropriate language properties file is missing.

    • getDataProcessors

      private void getDataProcessors​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Loads the classes and menu text for available data suppliers and consumers.

      For details of the associated files needed to add suppliers and consumers, see class-level docs.

      Parameters:
      fileName - Either "datasuppliers.properties" or "dataconsumers.properties".
